title: When A Man Loves A Women
lyrics: - The song starts in C# or Db, and then changes to D after the chorus, When a man loves a woman Cant keep his mind on nothin else Hed trade the world For a good thing hes found When a man loves a woman I give you everything I got (yeah) Trying to hold on to your precious love Baby, baby please don't treat me bad When a man loves a woman Deep down in his soul She can bring him such misery Yes when a man loves a woman I know exactly how he feels cause baby, baby, baby uuuuuuuh When a man loves a woman When a man loves a woman
